name: SoftSide Adventure of the Month 08: Windsloe Mansion Adventure
overview: Windsloe Manor Adventure is the eighth in a series of monthly text adventures for multiple systems. The world famous 'Pumpkin Man' has been kidnapped, and is being held captive in the dungeon of Windsloe Mansion. The owners of the mansion are Mr. Winsloe and his wife, a known witch. Your mission is to get inside the mansion, find the Pumpkin Man, and return him to your starting location. The player must locate the secret passage within the Blairs' next door mansion, and delve deep within Winsloe mansion. Within, the player may gain extra points by slaying three ghosts, a vicious dog, the moss man, a vampire, an alien, a giant wasp, and the witch Mrs. Winsloe. Finally, by returning with the Pumpkin Man, the player is victorious, and receives a score based upon the number of baddies they killed. Maximum score is 210. All commands are via 2-word VERB NOUN entries, and game play contains several object puzzles. There is no save or restore feature.
